i5.las2peer.p2p

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.p2p.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentStorage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalNode, PastryNodeImpl

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentStorage
    Base class for nodes in the LAS2peer environment. A Node represents one enclosed unit in the network hosting an arbitrary number of agents willing to participate in the P2P networking.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Node.NodeStatus
      Enum with the possible states of a node.
      static class  Node.SendMode
      The Sending mode for outgoing messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node(boolean standardObserver)
        Creates a new node, if the standardObserver flag is true, an observer logging all events to a simple plain text log file will be generated. If not, no observer will be used at startup.
        Parameters:
        standardObserver -

      • getNodeRepresentation

        protected java.lang.String getNodeRepresentation(java.lang.Object node)
        Derive a String representation for a node from the given identifier object. The type of the object depends on the setting of the current node. Tries to specify an ip address and a port for an actual p2p node (PastryNodeImpl or NodeHandle).

        Returns:
        string representation for the given node object

      • registerReceiver

        public void registerReceiver(MessageReceiver receiver)
                      throws AgentAlreadyRegisteredException,
                             L2pSecurityException,
                             AgentException
        Registers a (local) Agent for usage through this node. The Agent has to be unlocked before registration.
        Parameters:
        receiver -
        Throws:
        AgentAlreadyRegisteredException - the given agent is already registered to this node
        L2pSecurityException - the agent is not unlocked
        AgentException - any problem with the agent itself (probably on calling Agent.notifyRegistrationTo(i5.las2peer.p2p.Node)

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message message,
                        MessageResultListener listener)
        Sends a message, recipient and sender are stated in the message. The node tries to find a node hosting the recipient and sends the message there.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        listener - a listener for getting the result separately

      • sendMessage

        public abstract void sendMessage(Message message,
                                 MessageResultListener listener,
                                 Node.SendMode mode)
        Sends a message, recipient and sender are stated in the message. Depending on the mode, either all nodes running the given agent will be notified of this message, or only a random one. NOTE: Pastry nodes will always use broadcast at the moment!
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        listener - a listener for getting the result separately
        mode - is it a broadcast or an any-cast message?

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage(Message message)
                    throws AgentNotKnownException,
                           MessageException,
                           L2pSecurityException
        For external access to this node. Will be called by the (P2P) network library, when a new message has been received via the network and could not be handled otherwise. Make sure, that the baseClassLoader method is used for answer messages.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Throws:
        AgentNotKnownException - the designated recipient is not known at this node
        MessageException
        L2pSecurityException

        public abstract java.lang.Object[] findRegisteredAgent(long agentId,
                                                       int hintOfExpectedCount)
                                                throws AgentNotKnownException
        Searches the nodes for registered Versions of the given Agent. Returns an array of objects identifying the nodes the given agent is registered to.

        agentId - id of the agent to look for
        hintOfExpectedCount - a hint for the expected number of results (e.g. to wait for)

        AgentNotKnownException

      • getAgent

        public abstract Agent getAgent(long id)
                        throws AgentNotKnownException
        Gets an agent description from the net. make sure, always to return fresh versions of the requested agent, so that no thread can unlock the private key for another one!
        Specified by:

      • invoke

        public java.io.Serializable invoke(Agent executing,
                                   ServiceNameVersion service,
                                   java.lang.String serviceMethod,
                                   java.io.Serializable[] parameters,
                                   boolean preferLocal)
                            throws AgentNotKnownException,
                                   L2pServiceException,
                                   L2pSecurityException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   TimeoutException
        invoke a specific service version in the network
        Parameters:
        executing - the executing agent
        service - the service version to execute
        serviceMethod - the method to execute
        parameters - method parameters
        preferLocal - turn off load balancing to prefer locally running services
        Returns:
        the invocation result
        Throws:
        AgentNotKnownException
        L2pServiceException
        L2pSecurityException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        TimeoutException

      • invoke

        public java.io.Serializable invoke(Agent executing,
                                   java.lang.String serviceString,
                                   java.lang.String serviceMethod,
                                   java.io.Serializable[] parameters,
                                   boolean preferLocal)
                            throws AgentNotKnownException,
                                   L2pServiceException,
                                   L2pSecurityException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   TimeoutException
        invoke a service in the network, chooses appropriate version
        Parameters:
        executing -
        serviceString - The service class to execute. A version can be specified using "...@major.minor.sub-build", the closest version will be picked. If no version is specified, the newest version will be choosen.
        serviceMethod -
        parameters -
        preferLocal -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AgentNotKnownException
        L2pServiceException
        L2pSecurityException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        TimeoutException
